formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Applikation in Asterisk 1.6:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'MinivmAccMess' =-
[Synopsis] Record account specific messages
[Description] MinivmAccmess(username@domain,option): This application is part of the Mini-Voicemail system, configured in minivm.conf. Use this application to record account specific audio/video messages for busy, unavailable and temporary messages. Account specific directories will be created if they do not exist.
The option selects message to be recorded: u Unavailable b Busy t Temporary (overrides busy and unavailable) n Account name
Result is given in channel variable MINIVM_ACCMESS_STATUS The possible values are: SUCCESS | FAILED FAILED is set if the file can't be created.

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:
